washerwoman: Washerwoman (Townsfolk) - You start knowing that 1 of 2 players is a particular Townsfolk.
librarian: Librarian (Townsfolk) - You start knowing that 1 of 2 players is a particular Outsider. (Or that zero are in play.)
investigator: Investigator (Townsfolk) - You start knowing that 1 of 2 players is a particular Minion.
chef: Chef (Townsfolk) - You start knowing how many pairs of evil players there are.
empath: Empath (Townsfolk) - Each night, you learn how many of your 2 alive neighbors are evil.
fortune teller: Fortune Teller (Townsfolk) - Each night, choose 2 players: you learn if either is a Demon. There is a good player that registers as a Demon to you.
undertaker: Undertaker (Townsfolk) - Each night*, you learn which character died by execution today.
monk: Monk (Townsfolk) - Each night*, choose a player (not yourself): they are safe from the Demon tonight.
ravenkeeper: Ravenkeeper (Townsfolk) - If you die at night, you are woken to choose a player: you learn their character.
virgin: Virgin (Townsfolk) - The 1st time you are nominated, if the nominator is a Townsfolk, they are executed immediately.
slayer: Slayer (Townsfolk) - Once per game, during the day, publicly choose a player: if they are the Demon, they die.
soldier: Soldier (Townsfolk) - You are safe from the Demon.
mayor: Mayor (Townsfolk) - If only 3 players live & no execution occurs, your team wins. If you die at night, another player might die instead.
butler: Butler (Outsider) - Each night, choose a player (not yourself): tomorrow, you may only vote if they are voting too.
drunk: Drunk (Outsider) - You do not know you are the Drunk. You think you are a Townsfolk character, but you are not.
recluse: Recluse (Outsider) - You might register as evil & as a Minion or Demon, even if dead.
saint: Saint (Outsider) - If you die by execution, your team loses.
poisoner: Poisoner (Minion) - Each night, choose a player: they are poisoned tonight and tomorrow day.
spy: Spy (Minion) - Each night, you see the Grimoire. You might register as good & as a Townsfolk or Outsider, even if dead.
scarlet woman: Scarlet Woman (Minion) - If there are 5 or more players alive & the Demon dies, you become the Demon. (Travellers don’t count)
baron: Baron (Minion) - There are extra Outsiders in play. [+2 Outsiders]
imp: Imp (Demon) - Each night*, choose a player: they die. If you kill yourself this way, a Minion becomes the Imp.
bureaucrat: Bureaucrat (Traveler) - Each night, choose a player (not yourself): their vote counts as 3 votes tomorrow.
thief: Thief (Traveler) - Each night, choose a player (not yourself): their vote counts negatively tomorrow.
gunslinger: Gunslinger (Traveler) - Each day, after the 1st vote has been tallied, you may choose a player that voted: they die.
scapegoat: Scapegoat (Traveler) - If a player of your alignment is executed, you might be executed instead.
beggar: Beggar (Traveler) - You must use a vote token to vote. If a dead player gives you theirs, you learn their alignment. You are sober & healthy.
grandmother: Grandmother (Townsfolk) - You start knowing a good player & their character. If the Demon kills them, you die too.
sailor: Sailor (Townsfolk) - Each night, choose an alive player: either you or they are drunk until dusk. You can't die.
chambermaid: Chambermaid (Townsfolk) - Each night, choose 2 alive players (not yourself): you learn how many woke tonight due to their ability.
exorcist: Exorcist (Townsfolk) - Each night*, choose a player (different to last night): the Demon, if chosen, learns who you are then doesn't wake tonight.
innkeeper: Innkeeper (Townsfolk) - Each night*, choose 2 players: they can't die tonight, but 1 is drunk until dusk.
gambler: Gambler (Townsfolk) - Each night*, choose a player & guess their character: if you guess wrong, you die.
gossip: Gossip (Townsfolk) - Each day, you may make a public statement. Tonight, if it was true, a player dies.
courtier: Courtier (Townsfolk) - Once per game, at night, choose a character: they are drunk for 3 nights & 3 days.
professor: Professor (Townsfolk) - Once per game, at night*, choose a dead player: if they are a Townsfolk, they are resurrected.
minstrel: Minstrel (Townsfolk) - When a Minion dies by execution, all other players (except Travellers) are drunk until dusk tomorrow.
tea lady: Tea Lady (Townsfolk) - If both your alive neighbors are good, they can't die.
pacifist: Pacifist (Townsfolk) - Executed good players might not die.
fool: Fool (Townsfolk) - The first time you die, you don't.
tinker: Tinker (Outsider) - You might die at any time.
moonchild: Moonchild (Outsider) - When you learn that you died, publicly choose 1 alive player. Tonight, if it was a good player, they die.
goon: Goon (Outsider) - Each night, the 1st player to choose you with their ability is drunk until dusk. You become their alignment.
lunatic: Lunatic (Outsider) - You think you are a Demon, but you are not. The Demon knows who you are & who you choose at night.
godfather: Godfather (Minion) - You start knowing which Outsiders are in play. If 1 died today, choose a player tonight: they die. [-1 or +1 Outsider]
devil's advocate: Devil's Advocate (Minion) - Each night, choose a living player (different to last night): if executed tomorrow, they don't die.
assassin: Assassin (Minion) - Once per game, at night*, choose a player: they die, even if for some reason they could not.
mastermind: Mastermind (Minion) - If the Demon dies by execution (ending the game), play for 1 more day. If a player is then executed, their team loses.
zombuul: Zombuul (Demon) - Each night*, if no-one died today, choose a player: they die. The 1st time you die, you live but register as dead.
pukka: Pukka (Demon) - Each night, choose a player: they are poisoned. The previously poisoned player dies then becomes healthy.
shabaloth: Shabaloth (Demon) - Each night*, choose 2 players: they die. A dead player you chose last night might be regurgitated.
po: Po (Demon) - Each night*, you may choose a player: they die. If your last choice was no-one, choose 3 players tonight.
apprentice: Apprentice (Traveler) - On your 1st night, you gain a Townsfolk ability (if good), or a Minion ability (if evil).
matron: Matron (Traveler) - Each day, you may choose up to 3 sets of 2 players to swap seats. Players may not leave their seats to talk in private.
judge: Judge (Traveler) - Once per game, if another player nominated, you may choose to force the current execution to pass or fail.
bishop: Bishop (Traveler) - Only the Storyteller can nominate. At least 1 opposite player must be nominated each day.
voudon: Voudon (Traveler) - Only you and the dead can vote. They don't need a vote token to do so. A 50% majority is not required.
clockmaker: Clockmaker (Townsfolk) - You start knowing how many steps from the Demon to its nearest Minion.
dreamer: Dreamer (Townsfolk) - Each night, choose a player (not yourself or Travellers): you learn 1 good and 1 evil character, 1 of which is correct.
snake charmer: Snake Charmer (Townsfolk) - Each night, choose an alive player: a chosen Demon swaps characters & alignments with you & is then poisoned.
mathematician: Mathematician (Townsfolk) - Each night, you learn how many players’ abilities worked abnormally (since dawn) due to another character's ability.
flowergirl: Flowergirl (Townsfolk) - Each night*, you learn if a Demon voted today.
town crier: Town Crier (Townsfolk) - Each night*, you learn if a Minion nominated today.
oracle: Oracle (Townsfolk) - Each night*, you learn how many dead players are evil.
savant: Savant (Townsfolk) - Each day, you may visit the Storyteller to learn 2 things in private: 1 is true & 1 is false.
seamstress: Seamstress (Townsfolk) - Once per game, at night, choose 2 players (not yourself): you learn if they are the same alignment.
philosopher: Philosopher (Townsfolk) - Once per game, at night, choose a good character: gain that ability. If this character is in play, they are drunk.
artist: Artist (Townsfolk) - Once per game, during the day, privately ask the Storyteller any yes/no question.
juggler: Juggler (Townsfolk) - On your 1st day, publicly guess up to 5 players' characters. That night, you learn how many you got correct.
sage: Sage (Townsfolk) - If the Demon kills you, you learn that it is 1 of 2 players.
mutant: Mutant (Outsider) - If you are “mad” about being an Outsider, you might be executed.
sweetheart: Sweetheart (Outsider) - When you die, 1 player is drunk from now on.
barber: Barber (Outsider) - If you died today or tonight, the Demon may choose 2 players (not another Demon) to swap characters.
klutz: Klutz (Outsider) - When you learn that you died, publicly choose 1 alive player: if they are evil, your team loses.
evil twin: Evil Twin (Minion) - You & an opposing player know each other. If the good player is executed, evil wins. Good can't win if you both live.
witch: Witch (Minion) - Each night, choose a player: if they nominate tomorrow, they die. If just 3 players live, you lose this ability.
cerenovus: Cerenovus (Minion) - Each night, choose a player & a good character: they are “mad” they are this character tomorrow, or might be executed.
pit-hag: Pit-Hag (Minion) - Each night*, choose a player & a character they become (if not-in-play). If a Demon is made, deaths tonight are arbitrary.
fang gu: Fang Gu (Demon) - Each night*, choose a player: they die. The 1st Outsider this kills becomes an evil Fang Gu & you die instead. [+1 Outsider]
vigormortis: Vigormortis (Demon) - Each night*, choose a player: they die. Minions you kill keep their ability & poison 1 Townsfolk neighbor. [-1 Outsider]
no dashii: No Dashii (Demon) - Each night*, choose a player: they die. Your 2 Townsfolk neighbors are poisoned.
vortox: Vortox (Demon) - Each night*, choose a player: they die. Townsfolk abilities yield false info. Each day, if no-one is executed, evil wins.
barista: Barista (Traveler) - Each night, until dusk, 1) a player becomes sober, healthy and gets true info, or 2) their ability works twice. They learn which.
harlot: Harlot (Traveler) - Each night*, choose a living player: if they agree, you learn their character, but you both might die.
butcher: Butcher (Traveler) - Each day, after the 1st execution, you may nominate again.
bone collector: Bone Collector (Traveler) - Once per game, at night, choose a dead player: they regain their ability until dusk.
deviant: Deviant (Traveler) - If you were funny today, you cannot die by exile.
noble: Noble (Townsfolk) - You start knowing 3 players, 1 and only 1 of which is evil.
bounty hunter: Bounty Hunter (Townsfolk) - You start knowing 1 evil player. If the player you know dies, you learn another evil player tonight. [1 Townsfolk is evil]
pixie: Pixie (Townsfolk) - You start knowing 1 in-play Townsfolk. If you were mad that you were this character, you gain their ability when they die.
general: General (Townsfolk) - Each night, you learn which alignment the Storyteller believes is winning: good, evil, or neither.
preacher: Preacher (Townsfolk) - Each night, choose a player: a Minion, if chosen, learns this. All chosen Minions have no ability.
king: King (Townsfolk) - Each night, if the dead outnumber the living, you learn 1 alive character. The Demon knows who you are.
balloonist: Balloonist (Townsfolk) - Each night, you learn 1 player of each character type, until there are no more types to learn. [+1 Outsider]
cult leader: Cult Leader (Townsfolk) - Each night, you become the alignment of an alive neighbor. If all good players choose to join your cult, your team wins.
lycanthrope: Lycanthrope (Townsfolk) - Each night*, choose a living player: if good, they die, but they are the only player that can die tonight.
amnesiac: Amnesiac (Townsfolk) - You do not know what your ability is. Each day, privately guess what it is: you learn how accurate you are.
nightwatchman: Nightwatchman (Townsfolk) - Once per game, at night, choose a player: they learn who you are.
engineer: Engineer (Townsfolk) - Once per game, at night, choose which Minions or which Demon is in play.
fisherman: Fisherman (Townsfolk) - Once per game, during the day, visit the Storyteller for some advice to help your team win.
huntsman: Huntsman (Townsfolk) - Once per game, at night, choose a living player: the Damsel, if chosen, becomes a not-in-play Townsfolk. [+the Damsel]
alchemist: Alchemist (Townsfolk) - You have a not-in-play Minion ability.
farmer: Farmer (Townsfolk) - If you die at night, an alive good player becomes a Farmer.
magician: Magician (Townsfolk) - The Demon thinks you are a Minion. Minions think you are a Demon.
choirboy: Choirboy (Townsfolk) - If the Demon kills the King, you learn which player is the Demon. [+ the King]
poppy grower: Poppy Grower (Townsfolk) - Minions & Demons do not know each other. If you die, they learn who each other are that night.
atheist: Atheist (Townsfolk) - The Storyteller can break the game rules & if executed, good wins, even if you are dead. [No evil characters]
cannibal: Cannibal (Townsfolk) - You have the ability of the recently killed executee. If they are evil, you are poisoned until a good player dies by execution.
snitch: Snitch (Outsider) - Minions start knowing 3 not-in-play characters.
acrobat: Acrobat (Outsider) - Each night*, if either good living neighbor is drunk or poisoned, you die.
puzzlemaster: Puzzlemaster (Outsider) - 1 player is drunk, even if you die. If you guess (once) who it is, learn the Demon player, but guess wrong & get false info.
heretic: Heretic (Outsider) - Whoever wins, loses & whoever loses, wins, even if you are dead.
damsel: Damsel (Outsider) - All Minions know you are in play. If a Minion publicly guesses you (once), your team loses.
golem: Golem (Outsider) - You may only nominate once per game. When you do, if the nominee is not the Demon, they die.
politician: Politician (Outsider) - If you were the player most responsible for your team losing, you change alignment & win, even if dead.
widow: Widow (Minion) - On your 1st night, look at the Grimoire and choose a player: they are poisoned. 1 good player knows a Widow is in play.
fearmonger: Fearmonger (Minion) - Each night, choose a player. If you nominate & execute them, their team loses. All players know if you choose a new player.
psychopath: Psychopath (Minion) - Each day, before nominations, you may publicly choose a player: they die. If executed, you only die if you lose roshambo.
goblin: Goblin (Minion) - If you publicly claim to be the Goblin when nominated & are executed that day, your team wins.
mezepheles: Mezepheles (Minion) - You start knowing a secret word. The 1st good player to say this word becomes evil that night.
marionette: Marionette (Minion) - You think you are a good character but you are not. The Demon knows who you are. [You neighbor the Demon]
boomdandy: Boomdandy (Minion) - If you are executed, all but 3 players die. 1 minute later, the player with the most players pointing at them dies.
lil' monsta: Lil' Monsta (Demon) - Each night, Minions choose who babysits Lil' Monsta's token & "is the Demon". A player dies each night*. [+1 Minion]
lleech: Lleech (Demon) - Each night*, choose a player: they die. You start by choosing an alive player: they are poisoned - you die if & only if they die.
al-hadikhia: Al-Hadikhia (Demon) - Each night*, choose 3 players (all players learn who): each silently chooses to live or die, but if all live, all die.
legion: Legion (Demon) - Each night*, a player might die. Executions fail if only evil voted. You register as a Minion too. [Most players are Legion]
leviathan: Leviathan (Demon) - If more than 1 good player is executed, evil wins. All players know you are in play. After day 5, evil wins.
riot: Riot (Demon) - Nominees die, but may nominate again immediately (on day 3, they must). After day 3, evil wins. [All Minions are Riot]
gangster: Gangster (Traveler) - Once per day, you may choose to kill an alive neighbor, if your other alive neighbor agrees.
organ grinder: Organ Grinder (Minion) - All players keep their eyes closed when voting & the vote tally is secret. Votes for you only count if you vote.
vizier: Vizier (Minion) - All players know who you are. You can not die during the day. If good voted, you may choose to execute immediately.
knight: Knight (Townsfolk) - You start knowing 2 players that are not the Demon.
steward: Steward (Townsfolk) - You start knowing 1 good player.
high priestess: High Priestess (Townsfolk) - Each night, learn which player the Storyteller believes you should talk to most.
harpy: Harpy (Minion) - Each night, choose 2 players: tomorrow, the 1st player is mad that the 2nd is evil, or both might die.
plague doctor: Plague Doctor (Outsider) - If you die, the Storyteller gains a not-in-play Minion ability.
shugenja: Shugenja (Townsfolk) - You start knowing if your closest evil player is clockwise or anti-clockwise. If equidistant, this info is arbitrary.
ojo: Ojo (Demon) - Each night*, choose a character: they die. If they are not in play, the Storyteller chooses who dies.
hatter: Hatter (Outsider) - If you died today or tonight, the Minion & Demon players may choose new Minion & Demon characters to be.
kazali: Kazali (Demon) - Each night*, choose a player: they die. [You choose which players are which Minions. -? to +? Outsiders]
village idiot: Village Idiot (Townsfolk) - Each night, choose a player: you learn their alignment. [+0 to +2 Village Idiots. 1 of the extras is drunk]
yaggababble: Yaggababble (Demon) - You start knowing a secret phrase. For each time you said it publicly today, a player might die.
summoner: Summoner (Minion) - You get 3 bluffs. On the 3rd night, choose a player: they become an evil Demon of your choice. [No Demon]
banshee: Banshee (Townsfolk) - If the Demon kills you, all players learn this. From now on, you may nominate twice per day and vote twice per nomination.
doomsayer: Doomsayer (Fabled) - If 4 or more players live, each living player may publicly choose (once per game) that a player of their own alignment dies.
angel: Angel (Fabled) - Something bad might happen to whoever is most responsible for the death of a new player.
buddhist: Buddhist (Fabled) - For the first 2 minutes of each day, veteran players may not talk.
hell's librarian: Hell's Librarian (Fabled) - Something bad might happen to whoever talks when the Storyteller has asked for silence.
revolutionary: Revolutionary (Fabled) - 2 neighboring players are known to be the same alignment. Once per game, 1 of them registers falsely.
fiddler: Fiddler (Fabled) - Once per game, the Demon secretly chooses an opposing player: all players choose which of these 2 players win.
toymaker: Toymaker (Fabled) - The Demon may choose not to attack & must do this at least once per game. Evil players get normal starting info.
fibbin: Fibbin (Fabled) - Once per game, 1 good player might get incorrect information.
duchess: Duchess (Fabled) - Each day, 3 players may choose to visit you. At night*, each visitor learns how many visitors are evil, but 1 gets false info.
sentinel: Sentinel (Fabled) - There might be 1 extra or 1 fewer Outsider in play.
spirit of ivory: Spirit of Ivory (Fabled) - There can't be more than 1 extra evil player.
djinn: Djinn (Fabled) - Use the Djinn's special rule. All players know what it is.
storm catcher: Storm Catcher (Fabled) - Name a good character. If in play, they can only die by execution, but evil players learn which player it is.
gardener: Gardener (Fabled) - The Storyteller assigns 1 or more players' characters.
bootlegger: Bootlegger (Fabled) - This script has homebrew characters or rules.
ferryman: Ferryman (Fabled) - On the final day, all dead players regain their vote token.
archivist: Archivist (Townsfolk) - Each day, you may visit the Storyteller & privately ask a yes/no question about the Demon's ability.
astronomer: Astronomer (Townsfolk) - Once per game, during the day, visit the Storyteller to privately learn why they made a decision, but not what it was.
au’wre: Au’Wre (Demon) - Each night*, guess your Minions: learn which are correct. If all are, good learns this, and must kill evil today or lose. [Evil don’t learn each other]
beachcomber: Beachcomber (Townsfolk) - Each day, visit the Storyteller to learn a fact no other on-script Townsfolk could learn with their ability.
cardinal: Cardinal (Outsider) - If nominated, tonight, you become the alignment opposite to whoever nominated you.
cawthane: Cawthane (Demon) - Each night*, choose a player: they die. [+0 or +1 Outsiders, Minions choose who you are.]
cryptid: Cryptid (Minion) - You only know part of your ability. 1 good player knows the rest of it.
deserter: Deserter (Outsider) - The 1st time a dead player votes, become their alignment tonight.
esper: Esper (Minion) - Each night (even when dead), you see the Grimoire, then choose 1 character, 1 reminder & 1 player: the Demon is shown all 3.
executioner: Executioner (Minion) - Once per game, at night*, choose 0, 1, or 2: exactly that many players will die tonight (the Storyteller decides who).
falconer: Falconer (Townsfolk) - On your 1st night, choose a character. 1-4 nights later, learn who that character is (or that it's not in play, then choose another.
fencer: Fencer (Townsfolk) - The Demon attacks on the 1st night, but its’ victims die 1 night later. Each night, you learn who the Demon chose.
firebrand: Firebrand (Townsfolk) - If you nominate & execute the first person executed, that night (even if dead), choose a player: learn their character.
grandmaster: Grandmaster (Townsfolk) - Once per game, visit the Storyteller to privately learn who your most important ally is, but not why they're important.
huli jing: Huli Jing (Minion) - You start knowing 5 out-of-play characters. Each night, choose 1 of them: until dusk, gain its’ ability & you might register as it would.
inysyns: Inysyns (Demon) - You start knowing a day. On that day (from dawn to dusk) if good would win, evil wins instead. Each night*, choose a player: they die.
ketos: Ketos (Demon) - After the 6th day, everyone else dies. Each night*, guess a player & a good character: if right, the end comes one day sooner.
local hero: Local Hero (Townsfolk) - You start knowing an in-play opposing character. If an evil ability kills you, that character dies too.
miasma: Miasma (Minion) - Once per game, at night, choose that all Townsfolk are poisoned & get false information until dusk.
mouldwarp: Mouldwarp (Minion) - On your 1st night, become an out-of-play Demon with this ability. Demons only wake to kill every other night (even if dead).
obscrul: Obscrul (Demon) - Only you know what your ability is. Once per game, the Archivist may publicly guess it: if right, you die. [+the Archivist]
occultist: Occultist (Outsider) - You might be executed unless you are mad about learning something new every day. Once per game, when you visit the Storyteller, you learn a fact.
penitent: Penitent (Outsider) - If you died today or tonight, the Demon may change their ability to "Each night*, choose 2 players: they die."
perfumer: Perfumer (Outsider) - The 1st time an evil player is nominated & executed by another evil player, their Townsfolk neighbors are poisoned (even if dead).
prankster: Prankster (Townsfolk) - Each night*, choose a player: if a Minion, their ability becomes "Each night, choose a player: the Demon learns their character."
silversmith: Silversmith (Townsfolk) - On the final day, you decide who is executed (everyone learns this). If you die at night, another player might die instead.
sleepwalker: Sleepwalker (Outsider) - You think you’re a Townsfolk, but you have a different ability with the same choices. 1 good player knows you’re in play.
spice trader: Spice Trader (Townsfolk) - Each night*, learn how many evil players voted today. If you would learn a 0, you become drunk.
steeplejack: Steeplejack (Townsfolk) - If you die at night, you are woken to choose 2 "You start knowing" characters & get their info.
surgeon: Surgeon (Townsfolk) - Twice per game, at night*, you may choose a living player: they live if they would die, and vice versa. The Demon cannot die this way.
tactician: Tactician (Townsfolk) - Each night*, choose 2 living players: learn which one the Storyteller thinks it’d be better for the Demon to kill tonight.
terminus: Terminus (Demon) - Each night*, choose a player: they die. On the final day, the nominee with the least votes is executed instead.
visionary: Visionary (Minion) - You & a good player start knowing a question. Once per game, publicly answer it: if correct, your team wins.
warden: Warden (Townsfolk) - Once per game, at night*, choose 1 player for each on-script Demon: they are safe from that Demon.
weaver: Weaver (Townsfolk) - You start knowing 2 players: 1 of them learned something true about the other tonight.
wight: Wight (Minion) - The 1st player you nominated while alive and voted for while dead are poisoned (even when dead).
scrounger: Scrounger (Townsfolk) - Once per game, during the day, visit the Storyteller & choose a player: learn a true statement. If they’re evil, it’s false instead.
insomniac: Insomniac (Townsfolk) - You start knowing the nearest “Each night” character (not the Demon), or that none are in play.
huntress: Huntress (Townsfolk) - You start knowing the nearest Minion character & whether it’s clockwise or anticlockwise from you.
teacher: Teacher (Townsfolk) - You start knowing the nearest “Once per game” character (not the Demon), or that none are in play.
tax collector: Tax Collector (Townsfolk) - You start knowing 2 in-play characters, then choose a night*. If you haven't nominated 1 of those characters by that night, you die.
vampire: Vampire (Townsfolk) - Each night*, if no-one died yesterday, you die, then learn 1 out-of-play character for each day you survived.
parvenu: Parvenu (Townsfolk) - 1 Minion starts knowing you. Each night*, if they weren't "mad" about you being evil yesterday, they might die.
haruspex: Haruspex (Townsfolk) - Once per game, at night, choose a player: chosen Demons swap characters with a living Minion (if able).
inventor: Inventor (Townsfolk) - Once per game, during the day, privately design your ability: learn a condition. When met, you gain that ability.
clairvoyant: Clairvoyant (Townsfolk) - If you died last night, you may visit the Storyteller today to learn 1 fact about the Demon's bluffs.
pilgrim: Pilgrim (Townsfolk) - Each day, you may visit the Storyteller to learn a Traveller the Storyteller would like to travel in, and a hint as to why.
crime writer: Crime Writer (Townsfolk) - The Demon also has the Butler’s ability. [-the Butler]
escape artist: Escape Artist (Outsider) - Once, at dawn, you may declare that if a good player dies today, good loses, but if evil dies, you learn who the Demon is. If you died, you must.
wind-viced: Wind-Viced (Outsider) - You think you are a Minion, but you are not. [The Demon is Au'Wre]
turncoat: Turncoat (Outsider) - If you are the most “mad” about wanting to execute the Demon player, you become evil tonight & learn who the Demon is.
sallow: Sallow (Minion) - You start knowing which opposing characters are in-play. Then, choose 1 of them: they might register falsely. If they die, choose again.
spectre: Spectre (Minion) - Each night*, choose up to 2 good characters: you & the Demon register falsely to those abilities (if in play).
vessel: Vessel (Minion) - 1 Demon is marked on the script with 🕱. If the Demon dies & 5 or more non-Travelers live, become the marked Demon.
wind nymph: Wind Nymph (Minion) - You are safe from evil abilities. The 1st evil player to choose you with their ability each night swaps characters with you. [+1 Outsider]
trizkidek: Trizkidek (Demon) - Each night*, choose 3 players: 1 is poisoned until dusk & 1 dies. If you added an Outsider, choose 1 instead. [-1 or +1 Outsider]
unseelie: Unseelie (Demon) - Each night*, choose a player: they die. Outsiders you kill register as and think they’re alive until executed. [+1 Outsider]
